title: Name change
body:
I want to change my name and put Sucker in it if its legal and by legal i mean not offensive so if someone knows is sucker an offensive word.
Dont wont to get banned you know

replies.body:
AFAIK Sucker shouldn't be considered offensive at all! Noooooooow with that being said, I *can* think of a few words it could be combined with that *would* be offensive, so just be careful there lol.

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
